properties.name: Anju's Chatamari
properties.directions: In a warren of alleys in Dilli Bazaar
properties.comment: Chatamari so crispy it's almost like Dosa. Other Newar food is fantastic

properties.name: Duck Choila
properties.directions: A series of 3 duck choila restaurants. Recognizable by the ducks on the signs outside

properties.name: Thakali Daal Bhat
properties.directions: Across the road from the airport cargo bay and down the hill, marked by a black sign in Devanagiri script
properties.comment: Best Daal Bhat in town. Come before 1 PM while it's fresh.

properties.name: Bhatti
properties.directions: Unmarked joint down an alley by the Patan Kumari palace, look for a green curtain on your left when heading South.
properties.comment: Real hole in the wall with cheap chyang and cheerful owners. Chyang served in teapots.

properties.name: Tibetan Momos
properties.directions: Down an alley across from the barbershop next to the big Ekantakuna tree. Go all the way to the back of the alley and you'll be facing the restaurant.
properties.comment: Some of the best buff momos in the city.

properties.name: Raxi and Bara Spot
properties.directions: Signage out front all in Devanagiri
